00008 std::map<pthread_t, std::vector<ORVSigHandler*> > ORVSigHandler::fgHandlers;
00009 ORReadWriteLock ORVSigHandler::fgBaseRWLock;
00010 
00011 ORVSigHandler::ORVSigHandler()
00012 {
00013   fgBaseRWLock.writeLock();
00014   fMyThread = pthread_self();
00015   fgHandlers[fMyThread].push_back(this);
00016   fgBaseRWLock.unlock();
00017   fSetToCancel = false;
00018 }
00019 
00020 ORVSigHandler::~ORVSigHandler()
00021 { 
00022   fgBaseRWLock.writeLock();
00023   std::map<pthread_t, std::vector<ORVSigHandler*> >::iterator mapIt = 
00024     fgHandlers.find(fMyThread);
00025   if (mapIt == fgHandlers.end()) {
00026     ORLog(kWarning) << "couldn't find this-ptr in fgHandlers! "
00027                     << "Something is very wrong..." << std::endl;
00028     fgBaseRWLock.unlock();
00029     return;
00030   }
00031   std::vector<ORVSigHandler*>::iterator it = 
00032     std::find(mapIt->second.begin(), mapIt->second.end(), this);
00033   if (it != mapIt->second.end()) {
00034     mapIt->second.erase(it);
00035   } else {
00036     ORLog(kWarning) << "couldn't find this-ptr in fgHandlers! "
00037                     << "Something is very wrong..." << std::endl;
00038   }
00039   fgBaseRWLock.unlock();
00040 }

00042 void ORVSigHandler::CancelAllInThread(pthread_t aThread) 
00043 {
00044   fgBaseRWLock.readLock();
00045   std::map<pthread_t, std::vector<ORVSigHandler*> >::iterator mapIt = 
00046     fgHandlers.find(aThread);
00047   if (mapIt == fgHandlers.end()) return; 
00048   for (size_t i=0;i<mapIt->second.size();i++) {
00049     mapIt->second[i]->CancelAnInstance(); 
00050   }
00051   fgBaseRWLock.unlock();
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 void ORVSigHandler::CancelAll() 
00056 {
00057   fgBaseRWLock.readLock();
00058   std::map<pthread_t, std::vector<ORVSigHandler*> >::iterator mapIt; 
00059   for (mapIt=fgHandlers.begin();mapIt!=fgHandlers.end();mapIt++) {
00060     for (size_t i=0;i<mapIt->second.size();i++) {
00061       mapIt->second[i]->CancelAnInstance(); 
00062     }
00063   } 
00064   fgBaseRWLock.unlock();
00065 }
00066 
00067 void ORVSigHandler::CancelAnInstance()
00068 {
00069   fRWLock.writeLock();
00070   fSetToCancel = true;
00071   fRWLock.unlock();
00072 }
00073 
00074 void ORVSigHandler::UnCancel()
00075 {
00076   fRWLock.writeLock();
00077   fSetToCancel = false;
00078   fRWLock.unlock();
00079 }

00081 bool ORVSigHandler::TestCancel() 
00082 {
00083   bool testCancel;  
00084   fRWLock.readLock();
00085   testCancel = fSetToCancel;
00086   fRWLock.unlock();
00087   return testCancel;
00088 }
